name: Stratus: Battle For The Sky
description: Stratus: Battle for the sky is a fast paced RTS game set in a fantasy world of warring priests seeking to gain favor of the fickle Gods.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+, 8 Processor: SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 2.0 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 3 GB available space
